sentences.en: You can round off the corners with sandpaper.
sentences.cn: 你可以用砂纸把棱角打磨光滑。

sentences.en: They also give the shark's skin the feel of sandpaper.
sentences.cn: 鲨鱼的皮肤也有砂纸的感觉。

sentences.en: He rounded off the sharp corners of the table with a piece of sandpaper.
sentences.cn: 他用一块砂纸把桌子的各个尖角磨圆。
